participant_1.background:
I watch documentaries about aliens to remind myself that there is more to life than what we can see.
i am a casual dresser.
i live in a house in california.
i decided to become vegan a year ago.
My forgetfulness can be a nuisance to my running mates.

participant_2.background:
I value honesty in a relationship, and I want my partner to be supportive of my passions.
my favorite band is the avert brother.
I am a bit stressed from my work, but I'm generally a healthy person.
I check my security cameras to see if any intruders have tried to break in during the night.
I take a moment of silence to appreciate my family and the gift of time.

content.text: Hello! What is your favorite thing to do in the evenings?
I like to take a moment of silence to appreciate my family and the gift of time.
That is nice! I like to watch documentaries about aliens to remind myself that there is more to life than what we can see.
I like that! Have you seen the one about the pyramids?
I have not! I will look into that.
It is very interesting! What do you do for work?
I am a nurse. What about you?
That is cool! My sister is a software engineer.
I am sure she is very good at it! I like it because it is challenging and it keeps me on my toes.
That makes sense. I like helping people, so being a nurse is a good fit for me.
That is very noble! I am glad you enjoy your job.
Thank you! I am glad you enjoy your job too!
